it.polimi.se2018.utils

Class ClaParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.ClaParser

  • public class ClaParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a command line arguments parser.

    It is used to parse the command line input and find what commands have been inserted: it saves the commands that have been selected and is able to say if some mistake have been made when inserting the input.

    Only one among isServer(), isCli() and isGui() can be true at any given time.

      • ClaParser

        public ClaParser()

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parse all the strings passed when launching the program and stores what commands have been inserted in the class' attributes. If an invalid command is present stops its execution.
        Parameters:
        args - The array of strings that represents the configuration info passed when the program is launched.

      • isServer

        public boolean isServer()
        Getter for the isServer attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the '--server' command has been inserted, false otherwise.

      • isCli

        public boolean isCli()
        Getter for the isCli attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the '--cli' command has been inserted, false otherwise.

      • isGui

        public boolean isGui()
        Getter for the isGui attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the '--gui' command has been inserted, false otherwise.

      • isHelp

        public boolean isHelp()
        Getter for the isHelp attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the '--help' command has been inserted, false otherwise.

      • isError

        public boolean isError()
        Getter for the isError attribute.
        Returns:
        true if at least one of the inserted commands args have a non correct syntax, false otherwise.

      • getConfigLocation

        public java.lang.String getConfigLocation()
        Getter for the configLocation
        Returns:
        The path where to find the configuration file.
